channel.title: Soul split gfx
channel.description:
Pi source 317
Ok so i recently added soul split for my 317. And it heals smites does it things. but it doesnt look like it does anything... anywho what im trying to ask is.. How can i make it do a gfx thing so everytime you have soul split on and ur fighting a person it does a gfx.. like runescape for instints. it has the stupid white circle and the whtie balls flying into people.. So how can i add the gfx to it. Im clueless 100%
Also this is 317. With no higher animations thing/
